name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026: A Celebration of Rock and Beyond**

Bospop 2026 continues its legacy as a premier music festival, showcasing a diverse lineup of 39 artists spanning a wide array of genres. True to its roots, rock dominates the bill with 15 acts, complemented by subgenres like blues rock, hard rock, and indie rock. However, the festival also embraces variety, featuring everything from electronic and techno to folk punk, symphonic metal, and comedy rock, ensuring there’s something for every music lover. With an impressive average artist rating of 8.16, attendees can expect top-tier performances across the weekend.

The festival boasts an international flair, with artists hailing from 10 countries. The USA, Netherlands, and UK lead the charge, contributing 22 acts collectively, while Canada, Belgium, Australia, and other nations add to the rich global tapestry. Gender representation shows room for growth, with male artists making up the majority (27), while female artists account for 5 acts, alongside one mixed-gender group. Additionally, 4 acts feature performers of color, highlighting a step toward greater diversity in the festival’s lineup.

Bospop 2026 celebrates both established names and emerging talent, with 29 artists scoring a rating above 8 out of 10 from the festival community. From soulful blues to high-energy nu-metal and experimental sounds, the festival promises a vibrant blend of genres and styles. With its eclectic mix and strong international presence, Bospop 2026 is set to deliver an unforgettable experience for music fans of all tastes.
